title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 74.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 74.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part shall apply to the following
multiple use areas ("areas"). (a) In

Dutchess County: (1)

Wassaic Multiple Use

Area in the Town of Amenia; (2)

Depot Hill Multiple Use Area in the Town of Beekman; (3)

Taconic-Hereford Multiple Use Area in the

Towns of LaGrange and Pleasant Valley; (4)

Lafayetteville Multiple Use Area in the

Town of Milan; and
(5)

Stissing

Mountain Multiple Use Area in the Towns of Milan, Pine Plains and

Stanford. (b) In Putnam

County: (1)

Big Buck Mountain Multiple Use

Area in the Town of Kent; (2)

California Hill Multiple Use Area in the Town of Kent; (3)

Ninham Mountain Multiple Use Area in the

Town of Kent; and
(4)

Pudding

Street Multiple Use Area in the Town of Putnam Valley. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
74.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
